|cpu1_cspeed= |fla1=2 |fla1_brand=AMD |fla1_model=Am29LV160DB |ram1=16 |ram1_brand=GLT |ram1_model=GLT5640L16-7TC |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Intersil |wi1_chip1_model=ISL3871A;ISL3871AIN33, N0236EAEX; |wi1_chip2_brand=Intersil |wi1_chip2_model=ISL3684 |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=b |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains= |wi1_rxchains= |wi1_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Realtek |eth_chip2_model=RTL8019AS;RTL8019AS, 27061Q1, 233F TAIWAN; |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Kendin |sw_model=KS8995E;KENDIN, KS8995E, 0217A3, DC8048.0K1, 1282782; |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_speed=10M |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips= |flags= |stock_boot= |stock_os=μClinux;2.2.14;-v1.9; |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=b |default_ssid=wireless |default_ssid_regex=^wireless$ |default_ip=192.168.2.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui=00:90:4B |oui_eth=00:90:4B }} {{TagLine|Dell TrueMobile 1184 Wireless Broadband Router}} *OEM: [[Gemtek]] WX-6215D / WX-6215 :CPU is part S3C4510B01-QERO Router WAN interface is 10Mbit, LAN (switched) is 10/100 :The stock firmware is Linux-based *[http://web.archive.org/web/20050404033454/http://trilug.org/~chrish/dell-1184/ Serial pinout, pictures, firmware source] (via [http://web.archive.org/web/20040226172603/http://trilug.org/~chrish/gallery/dell-1184/DSCF0027 archive.org]) :[http://web.archive.org/web/20090111121429/http://www.pbnet.com.br/openline/bruno/hardware/ On hardware list] (via archive.org) • [http://mail.linux.ie/pipermail/ilug/2003-March/055449.html Boot log] (mail.linux.ie) {{SCollapse|[http://web.archive.org/web/20090111121429/http://www.pbnet.com.br/openline/bruno/hardware/ SOHO Routers Models] • [http://hri.sourceforge.net/hw/ Hardware] |

20 pin header (JTAG?), 8 pin header

:CX82100 (ARM9 150MIPS)

:CX82100, 20-pin (JTAG?) without headers
:Wind River Systems (DLF)

:Samsung S5N8947 VxWorks

:(Seems to be the same as USR 8011) P/N 750.5312

:Firmware mentions Intersil Prism
*SMC7004AWBR v2 (HED7004ACC) OEM from www.accton.com P/N 750.5435
:(Seems to be the same as Siemens Speedstream 2623)
:Samsung S3C4510B or S5N8947? (need confirmation!)
:SMSC SP37E760 (PC style 2x UART, 1x Parallel SuperIO chip)
:WLAN MAC is based on Atmel AT76C502, Wind River Systems (DLF)
:ADMtek DM6996 Ethernet switch
*SMC7404WBRA HED7404WBRAACC
:Samsung S3C4510B, ADSL modem included (?)
*SMC2404WBR OEM ID: GL2422RT-0T3-S01
:Samsung S3C4510?? (ARM7 MIPS??)
11/22Mbps
*SMC2804WBR v1 (HEDWG4005ACC)
Samsung S3C2510A (ARM940T)
*SMC2804WBR v2
:HED2804WBR (ISL3893)

1MB flash (MX29LV800BTC-90)
8MB SDRAM (Hynix HY57V643220CT-6)
802.11b Turbo AP, TI TNETW1100, ACX100 PCMCIA card
